channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pot hole and crumbling road surface in Tivoli Street, 22nd December
item.description:
The whole surface of the road is cracking up and giving way to potholes outside St Stephen’s Social Club on Tivoli Street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Tivoli Street, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling in alleyway next to 138A Cheltenham Road near 2nd electrical box in from Cheltenham Road, 22nd December
item.description:
Seen at approx 1315 hours 21/12/25, unsure how long it has been there - approach alleyway from Cheltenham Road end and it is on the left on the pavement about 20 feet in next to the 2nd electrical box in on the left ( at the side of 138A Cheltenham Road GL2 0JR )
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester

item.title: Amazon DWR2 car park, 22nd December
